text:
How to get a job thanks to AI (+ interview training):

1. Go to NotebookLM.  
2. Click on 'New Notebook'.  
3. Click on 'Discover Sources' and prompt:

“I need sources to prepare for my [JOB TITLE] interview at [COMPANY NAME].”

NotebookLM will pull company research, role insights, and recent news.

4. Click settings → “Custom” style.
Set your AI to act as a tough interview coach.

5. Ask for questions about this role.
It will give you 'trainer insight' to help you answer.

6. Use this guide to train on your best resources: 
https://lnkd.in/dMcU-Cn6

It will helps you spot weak points in your answers.  
It will show you how to match your skills to the job.  
It will push you to be more confident and clear.
